REQUEST_TIMEOUT.title: timeout for slow lookup requests, defaults to 60 seconds

TRIES.title: How many tries to perform, defaults to 2

PORTS.title: PORTS
PORTS.description: Specify the ports that need to be tried (they need to be available as IP services provided by, for example, NMAP). Multiple ports are possible as a CSV formatted string. For example: 22,111,137 will scan ports 22, 111, 137.
